Chap. Twenty-Nine - A Work That Cannot Be Transferred

     Parental Responsibilities Which No One Else Can Bear.--Parents, you carry responsibilities that no one can bear for you. As long as you live, you are accountable to God to keep His way. . . . Parents who make the word of God their guide, and who realize how much their children depend upon them for the characters they form, will set an example that it will be safe for their children to follow.
